archiefmat.titel: Treasury: Treasury Board Papers and In-Letters
archiefmat.titel_eng: Treasury: Treasury Board papers and in-letters
archiefmat.scope:
Original correspondence of the Board of Treasury and of letters to the Treasury together with reports and draft minutes.

The Board sat to decide on royal finances and the organisation of the Treasury and other governmental bodies, matters affecting the colonies, including Australia, New Zealand and America, as well as domestic issues.
